mapper.select: SELECT N.NO, A.ID , N.TITLE, N.CONTENT, N.VIEWS, N.UPLOAD_DATE, N.DEL_YN FROM NOTICE N JOIN ADMIN A ON N.WRITER_NO = A.NO WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT F.NO, A.ID, F.TITLE, F.CONTENT, F.VIEWS, F.UPLOAD_DATE, F.DEL_YN FROM FAQ F JOIN ADMIN A ON F.WRITER_NO = A.NO WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT E.NO, A.ID, E.TITLE, E.CONTENT_IMG, E.UPLOAD_DATE, E.VIEWS, E.DEL_YN FROM EVENT E JOIN ADMIN A ON E.WRITER_NO = A.NO WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT R.NO, M.ID AS WRITER_ID,M.NO AS WRITER_NO, C.CINEMA_NAME, TT.TYPE, T.THEATER_NAME, A.ID AS ADMIN_ID, R.RENTAL_DATE, R.UPLOAD_DATE, R.TITLE, R.CONTENT, R.DEL_YN FROM RENT R LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON R.WRITER_NO = M.NO LEFT JOIN ADMIN A ON R.MANAGER_NO = A.NO LEFT JOIN CINEMA C ON R.CINEMA_NO = C.NO LEFT JOIN THEATER T ON C.NO = T.CINEMA_NO LEFT JOIN "THEATER-TYPE" TT ON T.TYPE = TT.NO WHERE R.DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT E.NO, A.ID, E.TITLE, E.CONTENT_IMG, E.UPLOAD_DATE, E.VIEWS, E.DEL_YN FROM EVENT E JOIN ADMIN A ON E.WRITER_NO = A.NO WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND NO = #{no}
SELECT F.NO, A.ID, F.TITLE, F.CONTENT, F.VIEWS, F.UPLOAD_DATE, F.DEL_YN FROM FAQ F JOIN ADMIN A ON F.WRITER_NO = A.NO WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND NO = #{no}
SELECT N.NO, A.ID , N.TITLE, N.CONTENT, N.VIEWS, N.UPLOAD_DATE, N.DEL_YN FROM NOTICE N JOIN ADMIN A ON N.WRITER_NO = A.NO WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND NO = #{no}

SELECT R.NO, M.ID, C.CINEMA_NAME, TT.TYPE , T.THEATER_NAME , A.ID, R.RENTAL_DATE, R.UPLOAD_DATE, R.DEL_YN FROM RENT R LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON R.WRITER_NO = M.NO LEFT JOIN ADMIN A ON R.MANAGER_NO = A.NO LEFT JOIN CINEMA C ON R.CINEMA_NO = C.NO LEFT JOIN THEATER T ON C.NO = T.CINEMA_NO LEFT JOIN "THEATER-TYPE" TT ON T.TYPE = TT.NO WHERE R.DEL_YN = 'N' AND M.NO = #{no}
